attributes.action: Require commercial motorcycle or scooter riders to have a full licence.
attributes.additional_details: The ownership of powered two wheelers in cities is increasing quickly, and there is evidence that many commercial riders are causing fear and alarm, accidents, damage and speeding as a result of insufficient training. No other commercial driver is allowed to drive on a one day test or L plates.
attributes.background:
Currently riders can drive a small 2 wheeled vehicle after completing a one day Compulsory Basic Training course and undertake commercial work on it, including deliveries.
This can be repeated every two years. We ask that commercial riders require a full licence with proper training.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open that you may like to sign:
